Constructor Detail

URLyBirdServerImpl

public URLyBirdServerImpl(java.io.File db,
                          long port)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
This Constructor initialise the Server Service implementation in respect to the File instance of the database in use and the port number the Remote Server would reside for remote access by clients on the network

Parameters:
db - a File value of the database file
port - long value of the port number which this service will be made available
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if an exception occurs at initialising all necessary remote components to be used by this service
Method Detail

initializeServerUI

public void initializeServerUI()
This function initialise the server User Interface by displaying the user Graphical User Interface of the Server

public java.io.File getDatabaseFile()
If the need arises to get the Database file Object .. this function returns the database file object property

Returns:
- Filethe value of the Database file

getPortNumber

public long getPortNumber()
This gets the current port number of the URLyBirdServer

Returns:
- Long value of the Server port number

createRoom

public int createRoom(java.lang.String[] data)
               throws DuplicateKeyException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: RemoteURLyBirdServices
This function is called when the client connected remotely to the server when its requires a new room to be created in the database

Specified by:
createRoom in interface RemoteURLyBirdServices
Parameters:
data - - String array that contains the room data to be created which each element of the array represent the database structure field as expected
Returns:
- an Integer value of the row number of which new room data was created
Throws:
DuplicateKeyException - - if data argument unique key exists in the database
java.rmi.RemoteException - - if error occurs when trying to access this function by the remote application

bookRoom

public void bookRoom(int recNo,
                     long ownerId)
              throws RecordNotFoundException,
                     java.lang.SecurityException,
                     InvalidFieldLengthException,
                     RoomAlreadyBookedException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: RemoteURLyBirdServices
Function is called when client connected to the server wants to book a room passing the unique record number to be booked

Specified by:
bookRoom in interface RemoteURLyBirdServices
Parameters:
recNo - - an Integer value of the record number which the client connected to the server request to be booked
ownerId - - a long value of the client id who this room is gonna be booked to
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter
InvalidFieldLengthException - - If the argument String value length exceeds the required length
RoomAlreadyBookedException - - if the room was previously booked by this thread or another
java.rmi.RemoteException - - if error occurs when trying to access this function by the remote application

                throws RecordNotFoundException,
                       java.lang.SecurityException,
                       java.rmi.RemoteException

recNo - - an Integer value of the record number which the client connected to the server request to be booked
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.lang.SecurityException - - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie passed into the parameter

searchRecords

public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,URLyBirdHotel> searchRecords(java.lang.String[] creteria)
                                                             throws RecordNotFoundException,
                                                                    java.rmi.RemoteException
Description copied from interface: RemoteURLyBirdServices
Searched the record that matched the unique criteria passed into the function argument, URLyBirdHotel object of matched data are returned with there respective row number as there key in a Map data collection

Specified by:
searchRecords in interface RemoteURLyBirdServices
Parameters:
creteria - - array of string with 2 sizes, first element matching the Hotel Name and second element matched the Location
Returns:
- Map object of matched URLyBirdHotel object value with there row number returned respectively as the map key
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - - if data was previously deleted in the record or doesn't exist
java.rmi.RemoteException - - if error occurs when trying to access this function by the remote application

backupData

public void backupData()
                throws URLyBirdException
This function is called to backup (Store the data cookie stored in the Map into the database file) in respect of values the Map contains

Throws:
URLyBirdException - when an unexpected error occurs when writing the data value back to the database file

startServer

public void startServer()
                 throws URLyBirdServerException
The function call Starts the RMI and making the remote function to be available for call by remote Objects

Throws:
URLyBirdServerException - - if an exception occur when starting the server. URLyBirdServerException is thrown
